name: Astromech Shortage (V)
Lore: 'Imperial pilots often target astromech aboard Rebel starfighters in an attempt to prevent hyper-escapes. Scarcity of undamaged astromechs can delay starfighter deployment.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. During the power segment of a battle, may use X Force to reduce a starship''s immunity to attrition by X for remainder of turn. Once per turn, may use 2 Force to cancel the game text of a [Maintenance] character or a non-[Theed Palace] senator for remainder of turn.',
